Articles.Content:
build id = 00842

2015.05.01 at 21:02:12 CEST

Branch: master

Win 7 Ultimate 64bit, 8GB Ram

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570

Well again I have to report a bug.

Having a Mission, where I have to recover a Kerbal+her Capsule from the surface of Minmus.

Got the female Kerbal, was going to go for the Capsule and as I switched to said Capsule, it started falling THROUGH Minmus.

Fell and fell and fell deeper into Minmus, giving me no Chance to retrieve it.

Quite a Nuisance u can imagine.

Pic looking down from my little rocket to the capsule:

Pic from the Capsule looking up to my rocket standing on Minmus' surface:

I also can not switch back to my rocket, because the Capsule is moving.

I've also had this on a mission to recover a part from Mun.

I first landed a small probe near to the part so I could see just what I had to recover before building the recovery craft and all was ok. However when I approached in the recovery craft it sank into the ground as I got near to it. I tried reloading an earlier save (several times) and each time it sank.

I wonder if this was because I had already landed near to it, but that really shouldn't be a problem.
I fixed it by going into the save file and editing the altitude, "sit=FLYING" and "landed=FALSE". Restarting the game will make the unit float, but eventually drift back to the surface.
